job_history.role_name: Senior HR Manager, HR Business Partner
job_history.work_description: Transferred from PEO model to full service payroll and benefits set up, including RFP for various payroll and benefits vendors, interviewing for best fit, completing implementation phase, and working through follow up issues such as workers comp placement, tax set up in 15 states and five localities, setting up FSA and commuter benefits plans, ensuring smooth transition of background check and drug testing, and facilitating smooth payroll transition. Built and managed HR function across U.S. and Canadian locations, including full cycle bi-weekly payroll, policy creation and development, training and development programs, developing employee handbook, safety/compliance training, employee induction/orientation programs, and employee appraisal/review processes.

Processed all new-hire, benefits, leave termination, and payroll paperwork, ensuring 100% compliance with various laws and regulatory mandates and serving as primary contact person answering management/staff questions. Provided guidance and input on U.S. and Canadian workforce planning, succession planning, compensation, and benchmarking, while maximizing central areas of excellence to build pipeline of readily available top talent.

Oversaw life cycle benefits renewal process, including meeting with various insurance brokers on plan variations, presenting findings to senior management, coordinating open enrollment info sessions, and answering questions. Drove performance management, talent review, succession planning, and training and development.

Oversaw fire life safety program, including all building financial/operational components, interaction with all tenants, new construction and renovations, permitting and code compliance, and numerous other contracted vendors available for emergency recovery. Coordinated all engineer safety training with each assistant chief engineer each month for required OSHA safety training, including administering training, tracking attendance, and ensuring compliance.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in managing full cycle bi-weekly payroll, including setup, implementation, and transition, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Benefits Administration
skills.explanation: Has managed benefits setup, implementation, and administration, including RFP, vendor selection, and employee communication, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: HR Function Management
skills.explanation: Has built and managed HR functions across multiple locations, including policy creation, training, and development, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Compliance Management
skills.explanation: Has ensured compliance with various laws and regulatory mandates, including workers' compensation, tax setup, and OSHA safety training, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has managed teams and provided guidance on workforce planning, succession planning, and talent development, indicating strong leadership skills.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Has developed and implemented training programs, including employee induction, orientation, and performance management, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has managed projects, including RFP, vendor selection, and implementation, indicating strong project management skills.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has communicated effectively with various stakeholders, including employees, management, and vendors, showing strong communication skills.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has managed multiple tasks and responsibilities, including payroll, benefits, and HR functions, indicating strong time management skills.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Has resolved issues and problems, including payroll and benefits setup, implementation, and transition, showing strong problem-solving skills.
